<h3 id="X15254">X(15254)&nbsp;=&nbsp;CENTER OF THE PERSPECONIC OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND ANTI-AQUILA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(2*a^2-(b+c)*a-4*b*c-c^2-b^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(15254) = X(1)+3*X(9) = X(1)-3*X(1001) = 7*X(1)-3*X(3243) = 5*X(1)+3*X(5223) = 7*X(9)+X(3243) = 3*X(9)-X(5220) = 5*X(9)-X(5223) = X(72)+3*X(10177) = 7*X(1001)-X(3243) = 3*X(1001)+X(5220) = 5*X(1001)+X(5223) = 3*X(3243)+7*X(5220) = 5*X(3243)+7*X(5223) = 5*X(5220)-3*X(5223) = 5*X(5729)+3*X(5730) = X(5729)-3*X(15297) = X(5730)+5*X(15297)</b>
<p>X(15254) lies on these lines: {1,6}, {2,1155}, {5,516}, {7,5550}, {8,4702}, {10,528}, {21,662}, {31,4682}, {35,5506}, {38,4906}, {55,3305}, {56,8545}, {57,3848}, {63,3742}, {65,5047}, {140,12608}, {142,3647}, {191,5439}, {200,4428}, {210,1621}, {344,3416}, {354,3219}, {390,1837}, {429,1890}, {452,5794}, {497,5766}, {527,4672}, {673,6651}, {748,3666}, {846,3752}, {899,4689}, {968,4383}, {993,5126}, {1385,2801}, {1445,5221}, {2246,8299}, {2348,3789}, {2550,5225}, {2551,5828}, {2646,10394}, {3052,5268}, {3059,4420}, {3244,4753}, {3295,4662}, {3358,9942}, {3485,12848}, {3616,3758}, {3621,5686}, {3625,6541}, {3626,3773}, {3681,3748}, {3685,3696}, {3697,3746}, {3706,5278}, {3715,3870}, {3720,4641}, {3750,4849}, {3757,3967}, {3781,9047}, {3823,4660}, {3834,4655}, {3871,3983}, {3876,7671}, {3880,9708}, {3883,3932}, {3916,6173}, {3929,10582}, {3993,4852}, {4003,7292}, {4021,4989}, {4078,5846}, {4133,4399}, {4375,4782}, {4384,5695}, {4387,5271}, {4416,4966}, {4421,8580}, {5204,8544}, {5325,11019}, {5440,5696}, {5443,11662}, {5542,5852}, {6600,8668}, {7082,10391}, {7677,8581}, {7686,12702}, {7964,9812}, {8255,13411}, {8257,12514}, {8261,11684}, {9710,10624}</p>
<p>
X(15254) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 5220}, {9, 1001}, {5698, 5880}, {11372, 11495}<br>
X(15254) = reflection of X(3826) in X(6666)<br>
X(15254) = complement of X(5880)<br>
X(15254) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic  conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 9, 5220), (1, 44, 4663), (2, 3683, 4640), (2, 4679, 5087), (2, 5698, 5880), (37, 238, 1386), (55, 3305, 3740), (57, 8167, 3848), (63, 4423, 3742), (954, 15299, 5572), (1001, 5220, 1), (1125, 4672, 4670), (1125, 4759, 4672), (3219, 5284, 354), (3993, 4974, 4852)<br>
</p>
